text: @HillaryClinton south korea’s covid-19 response strategy was/is fast and free testing, expansive tracing technology, and mandatory isolation of the most severe cases.   Trump’s plan was “i have it under control”,  “it will magically going to go away,  blame Obama,  Lysol injection... SMH 🤦‍♂️
